class_notes: Must seek permission from faculty to enroll. Send approval email to nursingregistrar@emory.edu for a permission number.
course_description: This inter-professional elective is an introduction to core concepts in Global Health for clinical care delivery in resource-limited settings. Students will develop competencies across the domains of global health through formal didactic lectures and skills workshops.
sections: Class Nbr: 3864, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 1-4:20p, Instructor: E. Downes, Status: Open
